Author: u-w-a
Text: prepare yourself for it if you want to sell them and it could be triggering! pls remember that nobody will care whether clothes are too big / small for you, so many people morph clothing sizes and it’s a perfectly natural side effect of your body changing. it doesn’t mean you’ve gotten ‘fatter’ per se, the proportions of your body could have changed because different ppl gain more in certain areas and it may not be noticeable until a certain point. for all they could know, you might have changed clothing preferences (don’t like them anymore / prefer a different fit)

Author: semipreciousstoner
Text: Im pretty broke at the moment and I want to sell my old clothes that don't fit anymore (I used to be skinny), but Im so anxious about anyone I know seeing the clothes/sizing and knowing I'm selling them because I'm too fat for them
